#summary Vita of Gerd Volberg.
#labels Phase-Requirements

I work since 1992 in the world of Oracle Databases and Forms. After the first projects I thought to myself: Why must I invent each wheel new with each new project..

That was the rising of the Forms-Framework

In the first years the framework started with templates and pl/sql-libraries. After many years of using Oracle Designer more and more OLB-techniques moved into framework.

Using structured inheritances through object groups is now the main technique for all further development
